title: cryptogeniusdice
author: cryptogeniusdice
content: ( do not merge ) ever since i have exposed stake.com malpractice regarding nonce result manipulation and archiving the manipulated bet in. one day. i have wrote numerous emails here and there.few detailshttps://casino.guru/stake-casino-player-alleges-bet-manipulation-at-stake-comvideos showing the bet n resukt manipukated in csv format.https://youtu.be/DV27LcT1aTA?si=eWOsJ8PzS37Q7blwstake support staff revealed manipulated resulthttps://youtu.be/I2CRY7MwlwU?si=XHRDYpHRbXmfTNsgi have tried to contact stunna via email , and there is no response of primedice email and stake email as well ontelegram. Also i have tried to ask people from vip stake on telegram , and they stated they wont be able to comment on anything as of now.Guys get your Gut straight, stake.com is running a scam and soon they would be know their business would be over hence they brought  or founded in Kick.com where they can legit the business and funds will all this ripping of money. Hence the false promotion, two monthly bonus. they divided your monthly bonus into half and gave it you twice. And like fool people are still adovcating the casino.10 million dollars race is a scam , all majority holders are their in house players who receive payback for losses.Stunna has never came online since 15 th of july ever since i have asked the details of the bets and the .json format file which was uploaded and then deleted. Rip. Stake.com . RiP eddie. Rip Stunnaand if you are putting money in their false promotion and casino . RIP your Money.

comments.author: TwitchySeal
comments.body: Quote from: cryptogeniusdice on August 26, 2023, 02:12:22 PM( do not merge ) ever since i have exposed stake.com malpractice regarding nonce result manipulation and archivingThread should be merged with one of your duplicate topics.You haven't exposed any nonce manipulation.  Bet archives sometimes miss bets (they take 4,000 - 6,000 bets per second...so it's not surprising), yes, however, a sites bet archive is a convenience for a player and does not have anything to do with whether the outcome of a bet is provably fair. In fact, if you're relying on archived bets at any site to determine whether or not the outcome was provably fair - in most cases you aren't really proving anything.  If a player wants to verify a bet, they need to create their own records or verify after each bet or in small batches while keeping track of the nonce and how many bets were made themselves (not using live stats/graph pop up).

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: If you had a legitimate complaint and weren't just spewing nonsense, they might answer you. You have multiple ways to contact them, live support(if they'll respond to you), email, pm to stunna here on the forum, telegram, or hope they respond to this topic. Looks like you have tried many of these and gotten nowhere, not from the lack of response but more not the response you wanted to hear. Bottom line, if you had a real issue they would already have contacted you.

comments.author: OcTradism
comments.body: It is a very bad way to ask for support.If you want to get support, you must be friendly and don't use such words in the title. If a company, customer support staffs are professional, they can open to take their look at your case but if they already did it in the past, then you complained here in such way, they have rights to ignore your complain.So if you want to get like an escalating support, you must be professional and use good words, not what you used in the title. Asking for escalating support is not a special right and receive it or not, it depends on many factors. One of such is your attitude when creating your thread.I don't have doubt about professional of Stake.com and Primedice.com teams.Being inactive a few months in Bitcointalk does not mean the person is dead.

comments.author: TwitchySeal
comments.body: The pop up in your browser about sensors is not proof that the bets were manipulated.Missing bets in the archive is not proof that bets were manipulated.Quotestake support staff revealed manipulated resulthttps://youtu.be/I2CRY7MwlwU?si=XHRDYpHRbXmfTNsgSupport did not reveal manipulated result in this video.Quotevideos showing the bet n resukt manipukated in csv format.https://youtu.be/DV27LcT1aTA?si=eWOsJ8PzS37Q7blwThese videos do not show bet results being manipulated.Quotefew detailshttps://casino.guru/stake-casino-player-alleges-bet-manipulation-at-stake-comOk this link proves something.  The part where you explained what a byte is.In the real world, a byte is most commonly used to store a single character (a letter, number or punctuation mark).  I just checked the json length of a random mines bet on stake and it has 796 characters, so it would require 796 bytes of memory.  In addition, the problem is not that it's hard to store, it's how it's accessed.  I won't waste anymore time trying to explain this, my point is you've proven that you just make stuff up, stuff that a normal person that is clueless about something would spend 2 minutes on google so they don't look like an idiot.  And for some reason you expect people will just believe you.  I'm not a doctor or anything but I do know how to google and you've gotta be either completely delusional or a pathological liar.

comments.author: TwitchySeal
comments.body: Quote from: cryptogeniusdice on September 03, 2023, 03:33:13 PMlet me call you dumb sticks.1. when the stake support agents temswlves quoted the wrong bet odds in the chats. still you guys are advocating for them.2. you can have one people make the error, not two or three people.3. the format of bet archive also changed within a month. keep on barking. i am still saying stake.com is manipulating the bets and odds on mines in back end.Stake live support usually sucks and you seem insane so it's really not surprising that at some point the "wrong bet odds" were quoted. comments.author: JollyGood
comments.body: The OP is clearly very upset but unfortunately for him he seems he is venting frustration in the wrong place. From what has been stated in the thread it seems he is in denial because he lost funds and now is looking at shifting the blame on to Stake. If Stake were manipulating outcomes or altering historical data, it would have been picked up by now.
